replies.body: I have mixed feelings about the cosmic skins, wasn't Cosmic Reaver Kassadin specific to OCE? I mean, they're cool skins, but, i don't see any other Gladiator skins (Draven)(Italy) or Masked skins (Shaco)(Korea). I really think Riot is giving us the shaft here and showing they really don't care about the OCE server

Agreed, bought that skin thinking it was really cool and unique, now they're expanding the line to all these other champs
Feels bad

I can definitely understand the mixed feelings you have. I think of it this way:

1) The one unique OCE aspect of Cosmic Reaver Kassadin will always be that recall animation.

2) It just means our skin is so great it has inspired other skins to follow it.

I have to say the new attention to the Comic Reaver Kass voice filter. Is very much appreciated!

That alone is enough for me :P

Im glad that more skins have been inspired from cosmic reaver, it'd be a shame for such an awesome potential skin line to not be available.

I know nobody reads this because OCE but removing the money items is sad.
Can't go as fast on rammus and singed.
Need the holy trifector, Ghost-Talisman-Glory
GTG... Got To Go faaaaassst

Sad day. You should put the items back in, cheaper with the gold gen taken out as utility items if you're worried about the gold gen balance.
Any approximate date of release for our beautiful duo champions?
Okay nvm! I just read another article. To anyone still with this question, they're coming out tomorrow! (20th April)

I can't wait myself! I'm an Ahri main and love the concept of a assassin-like support. Check out the special icons you can get on launch if you haven't already xD  http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/get-special-xayah-and-rakan-icons-when-they-launch
Link? 12.01 and... no Vastaya. :P I know these take time.. but close to calling in sick to work because I'm so keen for this. :P
This weekend's going to be way more hype with the double IP event :)
0/10 still no Dark Star or Cosmic {{champion:136}}

I like how Shen has Monstrous Determination on his Q just like Aatrox's passive.
Completely not in line with the TLDR on Shen's Q buff (I say buff because he is now a stronger duelist)

I loathe the duo champion idea. People insta lock the two champions and ruin the game if they don't get the positions they want. I just had a Rakan go jungle because his Xayah didn't get ADC (she went support). The community isn't mature enough to handle this.
Are skins available for hextech crafting as soon as they are released?
Conqueror Karma looks like Storm from X-Men
if kha eats a poro does he gain kogs passive? {{champion:121}}

I remember the days of Seasons 1-3 when a new champion was coming out it'd be available as soon as maintenance was done, what happened to you Riot, I'm so disappointed that the new champs are unavail, they're the only ones I've been looking forward too since Draven.
